Majdi Smiri (a mụrụ n'afọ 1983), mgbe mgbe n'okpuru aha nzuzo Maguy, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na mba Tunisia. Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dịka onye na-eti egwu, Smiri ghọrọ onye nduzi a ma ama n'oge na-adịghị anya na usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn a ma ama Talaa Wala Habet, Lilet Chak na Case 460.
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1983 na Tunis, Tunisia.
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dịka onye na-eti egwu n'okpuru aha Maguy
O dere, kpụọ ma mesịa rụọ ọrụ nke Njoum Ellil na duet ya na onye na-agụ egwu Ines Chkimi
N'afọ 2006, o mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na ihe nkiri Making of nke Nouri Bouzid duziri
O mechara nweta diplọma na School of Arts and Cinema na Tunis
Mgbe ahụ ọ kwagara France ma rụọ ọrụ maka ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe otu afọ
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Tunisia, o guzobere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nkiri nke ya, 'Underground Skills', n'afọ 2007
Site na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, ọ duziri ọtụtụ vidiyo egwu na mgbasa ozi
Mgbe ahụ ọ duziri mmemme telivishọn dịka Koujinitna na telivisheneng mba, Urban Fen na Hannibal TV na Ser El Benna na Coujina TV.

N'afọ 2009, ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Farid', onye na-arụ ọrụ na onye na-eti egwu, na ihe nkiri Njoum Ellil nke Madih Belaïd duziri. N'afọ 2012, o mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Fausse Note nke ọ bụkwa onye edemede na onye na-emepụta ihe

N'afọ 2015, Smiri natara ihe nrite maka ntụziaka kacha mma maka ihe nkiri ncha Lilet Chak na Romdhane Awards, nke Mosaïque FM nyere. N'afọ 2015, o dere okwu maka onyinye nke Lilet Chak, nke Yacine Azaiez dere ma bụrụ Chkimi
N'afọ 2016, ọ duziri usoro telivishọn Bolice nke meriri ihe nrite maka Best Series na Romdhane Awards
